message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! That's a bit higher than I'm looking to spend. I'd be willing to pay $110 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $130.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  I'm still a bit higher than where I want to be. How about $125?  That's a fair price for both of us, and we can close the deal.
I understand you're trying to get as close as possible to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $128.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility.  I'm still a bit over my budget.  Would you be willing to go down to $122?  That's the very best I can do.
I understand you're really close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $126.
